short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Extension for uploading your CS2 case opening history to https://caseopening.live

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Track and visualize your CS2 case opening history effortlessly! This extension use your Steam inventory history, collecting data from your CS2 case openings and sending it to caseopening.live. View detailed dashboards showing your case statistics, item drops, and more.

How it Works:

1. Login to caseopening.live: Before running the extension, make sure youâ€™re logged into your CSCOL account to enable data syncing.

2. Install the Extension: Add the Case Opening History Tracker to your Google Chrome browser.

3.Navigate to Your Steam Inventory: Open your Steam inventory history page in your browser. The extension will display a dashboard, allowing you to begin the data collection process.

4.Wait for Data to Sync: Run the extension and give it a moment to gather all your case opening history. It can take some time depending on your inventory history size.

5. View Your Stats: Go to caseopening.live to see your dashboard with case statistics, item drop rates, your rank on the leaderboard and more.

Key Features:
Comprehensive Stats: Get detailed insights by rarity, value, and other metrics.
Leaderboard Integration: See how your stats stack up against other players.
Easy Visualization: Access clear dashboards with drop rates, item breakdowns, and more.

Public not obfuscated source code:
https://github.com/CS2-COL/chrome-extension

Stay on top of your CS2 case opening data and showcase your achievements on caseopening.live!
